genresAdvancedInfo.name: xenharmonic
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Xenharmonic music is a genre that explores alternative tuning systems beyond the traditional Western twelve-tone equal temperament. It often features microtonal intervals, complex harmonies, and unconventional scales. Xenharmonic music can be challenging to listen to for those accustomed to traditional Western music, but it offers a rich and endlessly fascinating sonic landscape for those willing to explore it.
